title: Lvl 30 1k wins Celebration :)
body: I recently hit 1k wins and heard of a tradition of a celebration game with a rioter :) If it truly does exist than may you bless me with your presence in a celebration game

replies.body: Yeah but what if you don't win it?

You're supposed to ask when you are on 999 wins if a Rioter will play with you for your 1000th win. GG.

Congrats anyway. Bless the grind.
